Class TextButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Control
        • TextButton
  • public class TextButton
extends Control
    A Generic Button to display text that is clickable. Owned by a World, which controls click capturing. Can also be used as a simple field to display text (set clickable to false). Massively improved over the previous version! Now modular, supports highlighting, etc. To implement highlighting, ensure that this is subclassed to Control.
    Version:
    v0.6.0 (December 2021)
    Author:
    Jordan Cohen

        Parameters:
        text - String value to display
        padding - the padding around the text, as an integer
        clickable - boolean denoting if the user can click it
        font - the font of the text, as a Font
